trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [index v] to [1] set [multiplier v] to [10] set [total v] to [0] ask [Enter an ISBN-10 number:] and wait set [ISBN-10 number v] to (answer) repeat (10) if <<(index) = [10]> and <(letter (index) of (ISBN-10 number)) = [X]>> then change [total v] by ((multiplier) * (10)) else change [total v] by ((multiplier) * (letter (index) of (ISBN-10 number))) change [multiplier v] by (-1) change [index v] by (1) end end if <((total) mod (11)) = [0]> then say [This is a valid ISBN-10 number!] else say [This is an invalid ISBN-10 number!] end
